name: @facts-kit/fact-note
description: A container to pass a tx (or data) and a compomnent through.  It returns the component with the data of the transaction data displayed.

scripts.build: npm rum build:types && node ./scripts/build.mjs && cp package.json ./dist/
scripts.perma-pub: npm run build && (cd dist && npm pack) && node ./scripts/perma-pub.mjs ./dist/ar-frame-0.0.2.tgz

author: Justin Shaw
